name: Twisted Wonderland: Your Story
description:
[UNDER DEVELOPMENT]

Desc: The most stressful thing for you was supposed to be your exams and surviving the school year. Now you're stuck with uncovering the mysteries of Night Raven College, juggling your schoolwork, dealing with drama and... maintaining a meaningful relationship with your peers? That's a thing you have to do?

FEATURES
  • 21 routes
  • Multiple endings
  • Customisable player name
  • New, non-canon compliant storyline
  • Choice-immersive gameplay
  • A bunch of jerks to befriend or romance
DISCLAIMER

This game is still a beta prototype, meaning many options and features are not yet playable. This is just for me to see if others are interested in this project.

I am not affiliated with Disney nor Yana Toboso in any way, shape or form. This is merely a fan project for entertainment, non-commercial purposes.

Twisted Wonderland © Disney and Yana Toboso.

This game can only be played on Windows.

The player is gender-neutral and is referred to by the pronouns they/them. None of their physical features is described within the game. The player is not Yuu from the original game.

If you like to make a playthrough of this game, feel free to do so! No need for permission.

I am currently not accepting any translations of this game. Please do not ask nor do it without my permission.

WARNINGS
  • There is screen shaking (no vibration) and bright lighting. If you are sensitive to any of this, please consult with a professional before playing.
  • There is character/player death in some endings. Please proceed with caution.
DOCS [READ PLEASE]
  • Guide (21/06/2021)
  • Development Log (21/06/2021)
CREDITS

Sprites, backgrounds and bgm extracted by alchemivich on tumblr.

Soundtrack by fulminisictus on itch.io. Used under CC BY 4.0. Link to their soundtrack playlist to their soundtrack found here.

Bedroom background by konett on itch.io. Used under CC by 4.0. Link to their asset pack can be found here.
